title: Great English writers
brief_description: Consists of three discrete programs, each one of about 14min on three great English writers. The programs are: 1.” The World of William Shakespeare”; 2.”The World of Charles Dickens” and 3. “The World of Geoffrey Chaucer”. Each places the writer and his work into an historical context, utilising location shooting and illustrations from old paintings and lithographs.
